message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40%.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still a good deal for you
Bob, the value is decreasing. Take this 45 before it shrinks further!
It's getting late, let's settle for 58-42. Inflation is not on your side.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
You're losing value fast, 60-40 is a good compromise considering the inflation.
